Whether it's CLI or GUI, your dApps are a few clicks or commands away from permanence. Heres the tools that make that possible:

entry.title: Re Focus 2: is where our new partnership with @CoinviseCo has added significance. We're exploring other pathways into the community such as public que...
entry.summary: Re Focus 2: is where our new partnership with @CoinviseCo has added significance. We're exploring other pathways into the community such as public quests and tasks, and fun activities like contests. And a powerful tool like Coinvise, can help make this as frictionless as possible.

entry.title: Re Focus 1: looks like enhancing our existing Scholarships initiative that @dabit3 created. We're also building out a cohort-based Fellowships program...
entry.summary: Re Focus 1: looks like enhancing our existing Scholarships initiative that @dabit3 created. We're also building out a cohort-based Fellowships program under @axisonexyz. The aim is to create a suite of distinct pathways into Developer DAO, that cater to different contexts.

entry.title: Re The Genesis NFT has a supply of only 8k, and the forked smart contract doesn't limit wallets to 1 each. So we realized early on, that there was a n...
entry.summary: Re The Genesis NFT has a supply of only 8k, and the forked smart contract doesn't limit wallets to 1 each. So we realized early on, that there was a need to create easier ways for people to join the DAO. After months of hard work across the community, we've narrowed down our focus
